info.brief_description: Stories about lonely mother's and their sons...
info.description:
This story will be about lonely mother's who either got divorced and didn't want to date again or lonely mother's who have lost their husbands to fate, one way or another, these mother's are all alone now and have been for quite some time with only their son (s) and how a relationship emerged between them.

The story can focus around the mother or the sons point of views, I hope to read about a lot of seduction and build up instead of just straight out sexual chapters... please keep any size changes out of this, it is a straight forward incestuous story.

Each new storyline may involve any kind of mother son relationship however the author starts it out as, straight out hetro sexual relationship, a sissy son and kinky mother relationship, a beastiality son and kinky mother relationship, or any other kind you may think of ....

There may be only one son or a few sons depending on the mother thread and it's beginning, keep it very sexy and seductive, the longing for each mother and son should be felt by the reader.

Thanks to all who reads and adds to this interactive !!!
